CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Initial Inquiries stage positioned above or below the Property Listed stage?
SRP.A: The Initial Inquiries stage is positioned {below} the Property Listed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Sale Closed?
VE.A: The value of stage Sale Closed is {60}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Contract Signed?
VE.A: The value of stage Contract Signed is {112}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Inquiries?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Inquiries is {295}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Listed, with a value of {352}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Sale Closed, with a value of {60}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Contract Signed to stage Sale Closed?
SC.A: Decreased by {52} Properties from stage Contract Signed to stage Sale Closed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {55} Properties from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Property Listed to stage Initial Inquiries?
SC.A: Decreased by {57} Properties from stage Property Listed to stage Initial Inquiries.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 204? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Listed} stage has {352}, the {Initial Inquiries} stage has {295}, the {Property Viewed} stage has {232}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 144? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Contract Signed} stage has {112}, the {Sale Closed} stage has {60}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 144 and 263? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Viewed} stage has {232}, the {Negotiation} stage has {177}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Negotiation} to {Contract Signed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Initial Inquiries to Property Viewed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Inquiries} to {Property Viewed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Negotiation} to stage {Contract Signed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Negotiation} and {Contract Signed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Sale Closed} stages.
